channel.title: Linux VPS
channel.description:
Base: Bulby :/ Problem:VPS isnt workign right, getting error stated bellow Errors(Compiling Errors): stated below Other Information/Media(Pictures, etc):
Well iv been hosting a 317 on linux, using putty. worked great and all. but now that i switched to a 508 it gives me this error when i try to start 'java server &' [CODE]Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit. root@aarscape:/home/aarscape2/bin/Bulby# java Server 15 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server (wrong name: Bulby/Server) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:634) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:142) at java.net.UR[/CODE]
i have no clue why this is, the path is right i even tried /home/aarscape2/Bulby :/

item.title: Linux VPS
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You could try putting the server into your root folder, than just type
java Bulby/Server

Read full topic

putty is a shell client
its the same as being at the actual computer
typing in the commands >.<

item.title: Linux VPS
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Well first off, you need to change the directory
cd /home/aarscape2/
Than
java Bulby/Server
I really don’t know if this will work, I’ve never used putty to start a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Linux VPS
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

Base: Bulby
Problem:VPS isnt workign right, getting error stated bellow
Errors(Compiling Errors): stated below
Other Information/Media(Pictures, etc):

Well iv been hosting a 317 on linux, using putty. worked great and all. but now that i switched to a 508 it gives me this error when i try to start
‘java server &’

Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit. root@aarscape:/home/aarscape2/bin/Bulby# java Server 15 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server (wrong name: Bulby/Server)         at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)         at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:634)         at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:142)         at java.net.UR

i have no clue why this is, the path is right i even tried
/home/aarscape2/Bulby

Read full topic
